definitions.definition: A device (now often electrical ) used to goad livestock into moving.
A prick or stab with such a pointed instrument.

examples: "It's your turn," she reminded me, giving me a prod on the shoulder.

definitions.definition: A light kind of crossbow ; a prodd .

main_definition: A device (now often electrical ) used to goad livestock into moving.
secondary_definitions: A prick or stab with such a pointed instrument.
A light kind of crossbow ; a prodd .

definitions.definition: ( programming , slang , uncountable ) Clipping of production ( “ the live environment ” ) .
examples: We've hit ten million users in prod today.

definitions.definition: ( demoscene , slang , countable ) A production ; a created work.
examples: Check our BBS for the latest prods .

main_definition: ( programming , slang , uncountable ) Clipping of production ( “ the live environment ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( demoscene , slang , countable ) A production ; a created work.

definitions.definition: Alternative letter-case form of Prod ( “ protestant ” ) .

main_definition: ( Ireland , UK , slang , sometimes derogatory ) Alternative letter-case form of Prod ( “ protestant ” ) .
